name: Roasted Potatoes with Green Beans and Mushrooms
author: Laurie
summary: Couldn't find the ready-made frozen version in the grocery store so I came up with these roasted potatoes with green beans and mushrooms myself. Even my eight-year-old likes it.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as Lipton®)
½ pound fresh green beans, trimmed
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Mix soup mix and 1/4 cup olive oil together in a large zip-top bag
Transfer to the prepared baking dish
Roast in the preheated oven, uncovered, for 30 minutes
Mix in green beans and portobello mushrooms
Sprinkle in carrots and drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil
Continue to roast until beans and potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes more
